title: Ucy
author: Ucy
content: I hope this people realize he is the actual President but power was taken from him to allow people to prepare for what is coming.I'm really sorry for those who continue to cross the lines that shouldn't be crossed. Just becareful not to touch him though because he is GOD's annoited. If I couldn't touch him when I had the opportunity to do so then you shouldn't too. The CREATOR has warned people not to touch HIS annoited, whoever does that will be punished.I'm so sorry for the daring ones in FBI. I am actually expecting GOD Righteous judgment on you from now on assuming you crossed the line. There could be replacement in both FBI & DoJ with patriots and I expect punishment for those who crossed the lines.  I read a post from someone who wanted the FBI to be defunded but I'm not sure it's a good idea as there could be patriots who could head the organization. That is what I would start working on if GOD Wills itMeanwhile there were certain people who wanted people to be killed/beheaded for treason. I hope we do not get to that when Power is given back to the Red King. I want it to be a smooth transition without anyone getting killed. So becareful.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: As you said, be careful.The Revelation was written almost 2,000 years ago. The Old Testament prophecies were given well before that.The Revelation doesn't speak only of things in its future. Rather, it uses things from different times and places, many in the past, and some in the distant past, to show what will happen in the future. How do we know? Because, in places, it references things that were prophesied hundreds of years before it was written.In addition, Christian scholars of the Middle East often have a different view of the meanings of the prophesies, because many world happenings of the past and distant past match the predictions. For them, today's world is different, because they recognize that some of the things we don't know much (anything?) about, already happened in the ancient Middle East, and are written in their history.History repeats itself. That's why there are people who make money off the stock market and the Forex, etc. Perhaps what is happening is simply a repeat of some of the past. But it is difficult to determine for sure.I recommend the book, "Revelation (Concordia Popular Commentary)," by Louis A. Brighton - https://www.amazon.com/Revelation-Concordia-Popular-Commentary-Brighton/dp/0758617933.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: Ucy on August 09, 2022, 01:31:53 PMhe is the actual Presidenthe is GOD's annoitedGOD Righteous judgmentthe Red KingNow that's proper nutjobbery, well done. Thoughts and prayers for your fucked up head if you're being serious.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on August 09, 2022, 06:26:26 PMQuote from: Ucy on August 09, 2022, 01:31:53 PMhe is the actual Presidenthe is GOD's annoitedGOD Righteous judgmentthe Red KingNow that's proper nutjobbery, well done. Thoughts and prayers for your fucked up head if you're being serious.So, you really don't understand that God is in control of this whole thing! He does what He does because of His own goals, and because of the requests of His people. But it's all in Bible prophesy.Bible prophesy is difficult to understand because the Bible isn't meant to be a book for fortune tellers. It is meant to be a book to save as many people for eternal life as possible. And since that is what God wants - the saving of people - He is the one who dictated the book according to Supreme Wisdom (Sophia - Jesus)... Wisdom beyond the understanding of people, so that unbelievers like you will think it's nonsense, because that's what you are asking it to be for yourself... God granting your request.Ucy has the right general idea, and a whole lot of truth. He is constantly sharpening his understanding about all of this.

Trump said solving the opioid crisis was a top priority. His drug office’s track record suggests otherwise.Well, I would say your post leaves no room for speculation regarding the Post's article. And if anyone wants to have a great laugh, I really recommend watching the following from 5:30 to about 11:00 on Youtube:Trump’s Deposition on “Dangerous Fruit” & Biden’s $7 Billion Military Mistake | The Daily ShowEnjoy

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on August 09, 2022, 07:10:11 PMSo, you really don't understand that God is in control of this whole thing! He does what He does because of His own goals, and because of the requests of I really do understand that nutjobs like you are pushing all sorts of nonsense under that guise of "God's will", which is really what you want but have no will of your own to achieve (or it's too absurd to achieve to begin with).And even if we go along with this bible thumper bullshit, it takes a special kind of moron to believe that Trump is actually the president right now.

comments.author: be.open
comments.body: Fresh Russian joke: In the published photos from the search of Donald Trump, a Ukrainian refugee recognized her toilet bowl.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on August 09, 2022, 06:26:26 PMNow that's proper nutjobbery, well done. Thoughts and prayers for your fucked up head if you're being serious.He forgot that we aren't living in 11th century Europe anymore.

He does what He does because of His own goals, and because of the requests of I really do understand that nutjobs like you are pushing all sorts of nonsense under that guise of "God's will", which is really what you want but have no will of your own to achieve (or it's too absurd to achieve to begin with).And even if we go along with this bible thumper bullshit, it takes a special kind of moron to believe that Trump is actually the president right now.The best I can do is agree with Jude in the Bible. Jude 1:8-10:Quote from: https://www.biblehub.com/niv/jude/1.htm8In the very same way, on the strength of their dreams these ungodly people pollute their own bodies, reject authority and heap abuse on celestial beings. 9But even the archangel Michael, when he was disputing with the devil about the body of Moses, did not himself dare to condemn him for slander but said, “The Lord rebuke you!” 10Yet these people slander whatever they do not understand, and the very things they do understand by instinct—as irrational animals do—will destroy them.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.right85 on August 14, 2022, 01:24:52 PM...Quote from: BADecker on August 09, 2022, 07:10:11 PMSo, you really don't understand that God is in control of this whole thing!It is meant to be a book to save as many people for eternal life as possible.Not understanding, unrighteous, unrighteous and hell fire punishment. For what is worth, this is politics and society. It goes down this way here so, we might as well let them enjoy it as, when it's come to God, gods and religions, your not expected to have reason or a freewill even though its said, God gave us freewill.Complex cause and effect shows us that we are programmed, and that we don't have free will. But we do have something that allows us to have wishes. God takes our wishes, and if necessary, goes back to the Beginning and tweaks Cause and Effect so that our wishes produce results for us. God maintains free will for us this way.
